snippet: A small-business owner tries to figure out precisely how many health insurance plans he has to choose from. Are we talking tens? Hundreds? Thousands? And in the process, he finds one he likes.
abstract: A small-business owner tries to figure out precisely how many health insurance plans he has to choose from. Are we talking tens? Hundreds? Thousands? And in the process, he finds one he likes.

headline.main: How I Found a Surprisingly Good Health Plan
